original: Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sārammaṇaḥ ca na anārammaṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sārammaṇaḥ ca na anārammaṇaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇañca na anārammaṇañca dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na sārammaṇam ca na anārammaṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam ca na anārammaṇam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ ca na anārammaṇaḥ ca dhammā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
